8ball.name: 8ball
8ball.description: 🎱 Ask the magic 8ball a question, totally very legit.

animal.name: animal
animal.description: 🐱 Get a random animal from the selected type

clap.name: clap
clap.description: Replaces 👏 every 👏 space 👏 with 👏 a 👏 clapping 👏 emoji

furryrate.name: furryrate
furryrate.description: 🦊 Rates how much of a furry the given person is. Value changes each hour

quote.name: quote
quote.description: 📜 Creates an incorrect quote with the given people

ban.name: ban
ban.description: 🔨 Bans a person from the server

kick.name: kick
kick.description: 🔨 Kicks a person from the server

purge.name: purge
purge.description: 🗑️ Purges the specified amount of messages

slowmode.name: slowmode
slowmode.description: 🐌 Set the slowmode of a channel (0 to disable)

e6sub.name: e6sub
e6sub.description: 🔞 Subscribes to an e621 tag. Making it periodically post images from the tag

starboard-required.name: starboard-required
starboard-required.description: ⭐ Set the required amount of stars to be added to the starboard.

starboard-symbol.name: starboard-symbol
starboard-symbol.description: ⭐ Sets the symbol to use for starboard.

starboard-enabled.name: starboard-enabled
starboard-enabled.description: ⭐ Toggles the starboard on or off.

avatar.name: avatar
avatar.description: 🖼️ Gets the avatar of a user

help.name: help
help.description: ℹ️ Displays the info page about the bot

welcomer-help.name: welcomer-help
welcomer-help.description: 👋 Shows a help page for Welcomer commands

welcomer-enabled.name: welcomer-enabled
welcomer-enabled.description: 👋 Toggles the welcomer on or off.
